rooms.title: A hotel in the heart of Bayonne
rooms.info: A FEW MINUTES WALK FROM THE OLD BAYONNE
rooms.mapTitle: In the heart of the Basque Country
rooms.mapInfo: Ideally located a short walk from Bayonne Old Town, the hotel is a perfect spot for discovering the region : Biarritz, Saint Jean de Luz...
rooms.roomDetails: The fruits of Patrick Norguet Studio's labours, our rooms are at once aesthetically pleasing and functional, practical and elegant. Classic rooms of about 18 m² for 1 or 2 people.

rooms.title: A hotel in the heart of Cannes
rooms.info: 5 MINUTES FROM THE CROISETTE AND THE FESTIVAL PALACE
rooms.mapTitle: At the foot of the SNCF station
rooms.mapInfo: Ideally located just a five-minute walk from the Croisette Promenade and the Palais des Festivals, offers a pleasant environment and a handy location. The Rue d'Antibes, a road brimming with shops and restaurants, can be found in the immediate vicinity. A further ten-minute walk and visitors can reach the Old Port or the Le Suquet district.
rooms.mapContact: 6 bis, place de la Gare — 06400 — Cannes —France
rooms.roomDetails: The fruits of Patrick Norguet Studio's labours, our rooms are at once aesthetically pleasing and functional, practical and elegant. Classic rooms of about 18 m² for 1 or 2 people.

rooms.title: A hotel in the heart of Grenoble
rooms.mapTitle: In the very first European eco-district
rooms.mapInfo: Part of the very first European eco-district, named ZAC de Bonne, the hotel overlooks the Jardin Hoche and is set against a magnificent backdrop. This oasis of tranquillity is also located only a stone’s throw from Place Victor Hugo, home to numerous shops and restaurants.
rooms.roomDetails: The fruits of Patrick Norguet Studio's labours, our rooms are at once aesthetically pleasing and functional, practical and elegant. Classic rooms of about 18 m² for 1 or 2 people.

rooms.title: A new hotel in the heart of Lille
rooms.info: A FEW STEPS FROM THE GRAND PLACE
rooms.mapInfo: The hotel is located just off the Rue d'Amiens, overlooking one of the most beautiful pedestrian streets in the old town. Nestling in the very centre of Lille, it is 400 metres from the Lille Flandres train station and under 10 minutes by foot from all the city’s main attractions: the Palais des Beaux-arts de Lille, the Belfry, the Natural History Museum and the Musée de l’Hospice Comtesse. A stroll to the Notre-Dame-de-la-Treille Cathedral offers a unique introduction to the delightful coloured facades that epitomize the city’s atypical architecture.
rooms.roomDetails: Our rooms are available from 2pm and can be occupied until 12 noon on weekdays and 2pm on weekends. An early check-in or late check-out can be available upon request

rooms.title: A hotel in the heart of Lyon
rooms.info: LOCATED ON THE BANKS OF THE RHÔNE IN THE HEART OF THE 6TH ARRONDISSEMENT
rooms.mapTitle: At the heart of the fashionable 6th arrondissement
rooms.mapInfo: Perfectly located in Lyon’s city centre, the hotel is only 20 minutes by foot from the Lyon Part-Dieu train station or under 10 minutes by public transportation. Opposite the Lafayette Bridge, and a stone’s throw from the lively Presqu’Ile district, it also boasts a fine view over the banks of the River Rhône.
rooms.mapContact: 14 bis, Quai du Général Sarrail — 69006 — Lyon —France
rooms.roomDetails: The fruits of Patrick Norguet Studio's labours, our rooms are at once aesthetically pleasing and functional, practical and elegant. Classic rooms of about 18 m² for 1 or 2 people.

rooms.title: A hotel in the heart of Nantes
rooms.info: Teddy, Anne-Laure and the whole OKKO HOTELS Nantes Château team are pleased to welcome you to the group's first establishment.
rooms.mapTitle: At the heart of the Bouffay district
rooms.mapInfo: Our hotel is also only a 10-minute walk from the city’s train station and offers immediate access to public transport services (tram, bus) and the "La Cité" events centre.
rooms.roomDetails: The fruits of Patrick Norguet Studio's labours, our rooms are at once aesthetically pleasing and functional practical and elegant. Classic rooms of about 18 m² for 1 or 2 people.

rooms.title: Your 4*stop-off at Nice Airport
rooms.info: Renaud, Jules and the rest of the OKKO HOTELS team are delighted to welcome you to this 135-room hotel in the Grand Arenas business centre.
rooms.mapTitle: The economic and cultural capital of the Cote d'Azur
rooms.mapInfo: The hotel nestles in the heart of Grand Arénas, the Côte d'Azur’s new international business district located on the outskirts of the city, opposite the Nice Côté d'Azur international airport. This convenient location allows for easy access to the city’s main landmarks. The famous Promenade des Anglais is only a 5-minute drive away (10 minutes by tram) and you will need only 15 minutes to reach the Cours Saleya at the historic centre of Vieux-Nice (30 minutes by tram).The airport is only 10 minutes from the hotel by foot.
rooms.roomInfo: The fruits of Studio Catoir's labours, our rooms are at once aesthetically pleasing and functional, practical and elegant. Classic rooms of about 17 m² for 1 or 2 people.
rooms.roomDetails: Our rooms are available from 2pm and can be occupied until 12 noon on weekdays and 2pm on weekends. An early check-in or late check-out can be available upon request.

rooms.title: A hotel in the heart of Paris
rooms.info: Chrystel, Maurine, Geoffrey and the whole OKKO HOTELS Paris Gare de l'Est team are pleased to welcome you to the group's first hotel in the heart of Paris.
rooms.mapTitle: In the heart of the Gare de l'Est district
rooms.mapInfo: Emblematic of the dynamism of the surrounding area, the hotel is part of the regeneration of the Gare de l’Est district in the tenth arrondissement. Located next to the train tracks leading out of the Gare de l’Est, and just 5 minutes from the Gare du Nord, OKKO’s Paris Gare de l’Est hotel is served by a whole host of public transport connections. Less than 20 minutes by foot from the Buttes Chaumont, Belleville, the Grands Boulevards and the Place de la République, the hotel’s idyllic location makes it possible for guests to walk to many of the city’s most iconic sites.
rooms.mapContact: 30 A, rue d’Alsace — 75010 — Paris —France (access in front of 23 rue d'Alsace, at the bottom of the stairs)
rooms.roomDetails: The fruits of Studio Catoir’s labours, our rooms are at once aesthetically pleasing and functional, practical and elegant. Classic rooms of about 17 m² for 1 or 2 people.

rooms.title: A 4*hotel in the heart of the La Défense business district
rooms.info: Mikael, Arthur and the entire team of OKKO HOTELS Paris La Défense are pleased to welcome you to this hotel in the heart of the La Défense business district.
rooms.mapTitle: Facing the Paris la Défense Arena
rooms.mapInfo: A privileged location in the heart of the business district, in a constantly changing and increasingly attractive environment. La Défense district is a real living area where workers, visitors and tourists rub shoulders over 31 hectares of pedestrian areas and 37.35 hectares of green spaces. Thanks to the Métro 1, RER A, Tram T2, train, bus and autonomous bus services, you can quickly access the heart of Paris and its suburbs.
rooms.roomDetails: The fruits of Studio Catoir's labours, our rooms are at once aesthetically pleasing and functional, practical and elegant. Classic rooms of about 17 m² for 1 or 2 people. Our rooms are available from 2pm and can be occupied until 12 noon on weekdays and 2pm on weekends. An early check-in or late check-out can be available upon request.

rooms.title: Our first hotel in Paris
rooms.info: OKKO HOTELS Paris Porte de Versailles team are pleased to welcome you.
rooms.mapInfo: The proximity of the tramway, of Balard Metro station and of the Porte de Versailles transport terminal makes this hotel the ideal destination for visitors on a business trip to Paris.
rooms.mapContact: 2 rue du Colonel Pierre Avia — 75015 — Paris —France
rooms.roomDetails: The fruits of Patrick Norguet Studio's labours, our rooms are at once aesthetically pleasing and functional, practical and elegant. Classic rooms of about 18 m² for 1 or 2 people.

rooms.title: A hotel in the heart of Rueil-Malmaison
rooms.info: Albert and the entire OKKO HOTELS Paris Rueil-Malmaison team are pleased to welcome you to this hotel at the gateway to Paris.
rooms.mapTitle: At the foot of the RER station
rooms.mapInfo: This exclusive location is providing access to Paris in only 20 minutes. It is also a stone’s throw from the business district, and a whole host of shops and services are soon to open in the vicinity. On the second floor, our guests will be able to enjoy a spacious Club area and its adjoining terrace.
rooms.roomDetails: The fruits of Patrick Norguet Studio's labours, our rooms are at once aesthetically pleasing and functional, practical and elegant. Classic rooms of about 18 m² for 1 or 2 people.

rooms.title: A hotel in the heart of Alsace
rooms.info: Gautier, Paul and the entire OKKO HOTELS Strasbourg Centre team are happy to welcome you to this 120-room hotel.
rooms.mapInfo: OKKO HOTELS Strasbourg Centre is part of the ambitious Black Swans development. A showcase for futuristic architecture, the project is under way on the river peninsula at the heart of the rapidly regenerating Malraux district of Strasbourg. Only ten minutes by foot from the historic city centre, the hotel also benefits from immediate access to a range of public transport connections (including tram and bus).
rooms.mapContact: Presqu'île Malraux - 46 rue du Bassin d'Austerlitz — 67100 — Strasbourg —France
rooms.roomDetails: The fruits of Patrick Norguet Studio's labours, our rooms are at once aesthetically pleasing and functional, practical and elegant. Classic rooms of about 18 m² for 1 or 2 people.

rooms.title: A 4* hotel in the heart of Toulon
rooms.info: MARTIN AND THE TEAM AT OKKO HOTELS TOULON CENTRE ARE DELIGHTED TO INTRODUCE YOU TO THEIR 98-ROOM HOTEL.
rooms.mapTitle: The capital of the Var department
rooms.mapInfo: Nestling deep in the heart of the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region, and part of a local neighbourhood in full transition, the hotel is approximately 10 minutes by foot from the famous “card game” sculpture at Place Raimu, as well as the Cours Lafayette and Toulon’s harbour, Quai Cronstadt. For those travelling with a car, the Mont Faron cable car and the beaches of Mourillon are both a 10-minute drive away.
rooms.roomDetails: The fruits of Studio Catoir’s labours, our rooms are at once aesthetically pleasing and functional, practical and elegant. Classic rooms of about 17 m² for 1 or 2 people.
